trans-unit.source: Provides an object formatted to serve as an event argument containing the information about the changed view state.
trans-unit.target: 提供的物件格式化，可做為事件引數包含已變更之檢視狀態的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: View state changes are changes made to a workflow that impact layout, such as positioning an element in a flowchart, or expanding and collapsing a container in a sequence.
trans-unit.target: 檢視狀態變更為工作流程所做的變更會影響配置，例如將元素放置在流程圖中，或展開和摺疊序列中的容器。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.View.ViewStateChangedEventArgs"></xref> class with a specified parent model item and its key/value pair with the old and the new values.
trans-unit.target: 建立的新執行個體<xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.View.ViewStateChangedEventArgs"></xref>類別指定的父模型項目和其索引鍵/值配對包含舊值與新的值。

trans-unit.source: An item in the activity designer model that serves as a parent element in the XML view of the model.
trans-unit.target: 做為模型的 XML 檢視中的父元素，活動設計工具模型中的項目。

trans-unit.source: The name of an attribute in the specified parent element.
trans-unit.target: 指定的父項目中的屬性名稱。

trans-unit.source: The new value for the specified attribute key.
trans-unit.target: 指定的屬性索引鍵的新值。

trans-unit.source: The old value of the specified attribute key.
trans-unit.target: 指定的屬性索引鍵的舊值。

trans-unit.source: Gets an attribute key name in a specified view element.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定之檢視元素中的屬性索引鍵名稱。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the name of a key in a view element.
trans-unit.target: 表示檢視元素中的索引鍵名稱的字串。

trans-unit.source: Gets the new value for the key in the current attribute key/value pair.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前屬性索引鍵/值組中的索引鍵的新值。

trans-unit.source: An object that contains a key value.
Gets the old value of the key in the current attribute key/value pair.
trans-unit.target: 取得在目前屬性索引鍵/值組中的索引鍵的舊值。

trans-unit.source: An object that contains a key value.
Gets an item in the activity designer model that serves as a parent item in the XAML view of the model.
trans-unit.target: 取得當做模型的 [XAML] 檢視中的父項目在活動設計工具模型中的項目。

trans-unit.source: A parent element in an activity designer model.
trans-unit.target: 活動設計工具模型中父項目。
